title: Which Collge to select, Islamic with no guarantee of job or Non Islamic College? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript: Aman from India. Ya Aman. Assalamu Alaikum Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuh. Wa'alaykumussalam Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuh. Sheikh In Sha Allah I'll be doing my Bachelors in Engineering next year and I'm confused which college should I select because one is Islamic college where studies are moderate and there's no guarantee that I will get job but the other college is non-Islamic and its studies are excellent also it has guaranteed job offer after my third or fourth year so which college should I select? As long as there is no fitna on your religion and your Islam you can go to a non-Islamic college while they provide you with good knowledge and information and at the same time it is guaranteed that you will get a job.
